pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṁ gacchanto aññatarena gāmadvārena atikkamati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.3_0: Aññatarā itthī sāmikena saha bhaṇḍitvā gāmato nikkhamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ passitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.8_0: Atha kho tassā itthiyā sāmiko gāmato nikkhamitvā manusse pucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.11_0: Atha kho so puriso anubandhitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ gahetvā ākoṭetvā muñci.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.12_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle padhūpento nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.13_0: Atha kho sā itthī taṁ purisaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.15_0: api ca ahameva tena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ gacchāmi;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.18_0: Atha kho so puriso taṁ bhikkhuṁ khamāpesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.19_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu sāvatthiṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.20_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.21_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.22_0: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mātugāmena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.25_0: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, mātugāmena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.27_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ, uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.28.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjeyya, antamaso gāmantarampi, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.1.6_0: manussitthī, na yakkhī na petī na tiracchānagatā viññū paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitaṁ duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṁ ājānituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.1.10_0: “gacchāma bhagini, gacchāmāyya, gacchāmāyya, gacchāma bhagini, ajja vā hiyyo vā pare vā gacchāmā”ti saṁvidahati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.1.12_0: kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.1.13_0: Agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.2.1_0: Mātugāme mātugāmasaññī saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.2.2_0: Mātugāme vematiko saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.2.3_0: Mātugāme amātugāmasaññī saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.2.4_0: Bhikkhu saṁvidahati mātugāmo na saṁvidahati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.2.5_0: Yakkhiyā vā petiyā paṇḍakena vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggahitthiyā vā saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
